title: soul stealer vayne
body: is soul stealer vayne ever going to be a direct purchase because I main vayne I love vayne I have all her main skills and i'd love to get soul stealer also because it is a sick skin but having to spend like $300 for her does not seem worth it hextech annie is different because it's a older skin vaynes skin only just came out and it's ridiculous to get iv'e used over $50 to get gems and have not gotten one it makes me extremely sad to have no chance to get soul stealer vayne :( is there any chance that vaynes skin will be able to purchase directly any time soon. ?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately not, Soul Stealer Vayne, much like Hextech Annie is and will be loot-exclusive.

Source: [RiotKateyKhaos](https://twitter.com/RiotKateyKhaos/status/742804164036550657)
